topic: hosting a charity event that can get donations from as many people as possible with a limited budget

steps.content: Budget allocation for different event activities
Selection of the venue for the event
Sponsorship and partnership opportunities to increase the budget
Outreach strategies to maximize attendance and donations
Planning of unique donation collection methods during the event
Planning for any necessities specific to kids with disabilities who will attend the event
Preparation of contingency plans in case of last-minute changes or unexpected occurrences
